name: windows
description: Window-wrapped components for the DraggableWindow-based window management system

ExtendedSearchPanelWindow.vue.description: Window wrapper for the ExtendedSearchPanel component

GalleryWindow.vue.description: Window wrapper for the Gallery component

NotificationPanelWindow.vue.description: Window wrapper for the NotificationPanel component

PromptGeneratorWindow.vue.description: Window wrapper for the PromptGenerator component

SharePanelWindow.vue.description: Window wrapper for the SharePanel component

UnifiedEditorWindow.vue.description: Window wrapper for the UnifiedEditor component
